title: After The Virus
description: After the virus decimates 99.9% of the worldâ€™s population, and all traces of humanity along with it, Rhiannon and Will are forced to move beyond their past fame, fortune, and personal demons to rescue a mute girl from the clutches of two warring cults.-------------WARNING: this post-apocalyptic love story contains mature situations, violence, and language.
author: Meghan Ciana Doidge
